instructions: Open WhatsApp. Tap Agree and Continue at the bottom of the screen. Tap Continue on the pop-up. WhatsApp splash screen WhatsApp permissions request Source: Joe Maring / Android Central Tap Allow on both boxes to grant WhatsApp access to your files and contacts. WhatsApp permissions request WhatsApp permissions request Source: Joe Maring / Android Central Enter your phone number. Tap OK to confirm the number you entered. Enter the verification code that's texted to you. WhatsApp verify phone number WhatsApp verify phone number WhatsApp verify phone number Source: Joe Maring / Android Central Tap Next . WhatsApp verify phone number WhatsApp edit profile info WhatsApp home screen Source: Joe Maring / Android Central

Tap the green chat circle at the bottom-right of the screen. Scroll to the bottom of your contact list and tap Invite friends . Tap the app through which you want to send an invite. WhatsApp home screen WhatsApp contacts page WhatsApp contacts page Source: Joe Maring / Android Central

Tap the green chat circle at the bottom-right of the screen. Tap New contact . Enter your contact's info and then tap the blue checkmark at the top right when you're done. WhatsApp home screen WhatsApp contacts page Create contact for WhatsApp Source: Joe Maring / Android Central

Tap the green chat circle at the bottom-right of the screen. Tap the three dots at the upper-right corner. Tap Refresh . WhatsApp home screen WhatsApp contacts page WhatsApp contacts page Source: Joe Maring / Android Central

Tap the three dots at the upper-right corner. Tap New broadcast . Select the contacts you want to add and then tap the green circle with a check mark . WhatsApp home screen WhatsApp broadcast feature WhatsApp broadcast feature Source: Joe Maring / Android Central

Tap the Status bar on the home screen. Tap the camera icon at the bottom-right . Take a picture. WhatsApp Status page Taking a Status picture in WhatsApp Applying a filter to a WhatsApp Status Source: Joe Maring / Android Central Add any filters, stickers, text, or whatever else you'd like. Tap the green circle at the bottom-right to add the post to your Status. WhatsApp Status emojis WhatsApp Status posting confirmation WhatsApp Status page Source: Joe Maring / Android Central
